mapper.select: SELECT o.*, o.order_count - o.plan_count unplan_count FROM orders o, product p WHERE o.order_count != o.plan_count AND o.product_code = p.product_code AND o.out_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{planDtS}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{planDtE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.update: UPDATE plan SET plan_date = #{planDate}, plan_name = #{planName}, comments = #{comments} WHERE plan_code = #{planCode}
